description: Let the decimal expansion of n be abcd...; then a(n) = (a*bcd... + b*acd... + c*abd... + d*abc... + ...) + (ab*cd... + bc*ad... + cd*ab... + ...) + ... . That is, a(n) = sum over all the digit strings of the product (number obtained by deleting a digit string) * (deleted digit string).
